title: Walk Away from Gossip
description: Today, politely leave any group or space where backbiting starts — even if it’s subtle.

title: 3-Day Backbiting Filter
description: If anyone speaks ill of someone absent, change the subject or excuse yourself for 3 days.

title: Gossip-Free Week
description: Avoid listening to backbiting in any form (in-person or digital) for 7 days.

title: Turn It Off
description: Don’t listen to or click on any content that involves drama, scandals, or celebrity gossip today.

title: 7-Day Gossip Detox
description: For 1 week, avoid all audio content that shames, exposes, or mocks others.

title: 14-Day Honour Guard
description: For 2 weeks, do not entertain any talk or audio that humiliates or mocks people.

title: Speak Up or Exit
description: Today, if someone uses harmful speech in your presence, kindly redirect or leave.

title: 3-Day Harm-Free Space
description: Create an environment around you where no foul or harmful speech is tolerated.

title: 7 Days of Listening With Dignity
description: For 7 days, avoid any gathering where speech is cruel, sarcastic, or vulgar.

title: Mute the Profanity
description: No music, shows, or clips with cursing or indecent jokes today.

title: 7-Day Sound Purification
description: Avoid indecent audio: music, podcasts, or anything vulgar — for 1 week.

title: 14-Day Clean Feed
description: Silence all platforms or channels that use mocking, obscene, or crass audio.

title: Respect the Boundary
description: If you overhear something private, resist engaging or remembering it.

title: 3-Day Ears of Trust
description: Walk away from any private conversation that you’re not invited into.

title: 7-Day Eavesdropping Fast
description: Avoid all forms of passive eavesdropping, digital or in-person, for a week.

title: Say One Good Word
description: When you hear someone insulted, say one positive thing about them in response.

title: Voice of Honour – 3 Days
description: Speak up kindly whenever you witness someone being verbally diminished.

title: 14-Day Honour Defender
description: Actively defend the dignity of others — especially the absent — for 2 full weeks.

title: One Hadith, One Reflection
description: Listen to one hadith or Qur'anic audio today and reflect on it.

title: 7-Day Wisdom Feed
description: For a week, listen to beneficial Islamic content — avoid everything else during that time.

title: 14-Day Learning Audio Habit
description: Replace idle listening with Islamic podcasts or Qur’an recitation for 14 days.
